channel.title: Food help (timer)
channel.description: How do i edit the food timer my server eats too slow :[

item.title: Food help (timer)

item.description:
@The_Moose wrote:

soooo…any help plz?[br][size=1]Posted on: June 27, 2007, 02:24:29 PM[/size][hr]ownae i replace my coed with ur compiled no errors sorta worked eats instantly but only 1 food then it deosnt eat anymore :S[br][size=1]Posted on: June 27, 2007, 02:30:59 PM[/size][hr]errrm sorry for triple post i got it working but now you can mass eat :S oh well its fine, ill fix later thanks yall.

Read full topic

Well I don’t mean to sound mean to Tico, but evidently he doesn’t know that that’s an array. That’s it’s set value.

item.title: Food help (timer)
item.dc:creator: @The_Moose The Moose
item.description:
@The_Moose wrote:

but m8 i dont have all that i have just this

[code]/HEALING/

public int healTimer = 0;

public boolean healing() {
	if (actionTimer == 0 && healing[0] == 1) {
		actionAmount++;
		actionTimer = 2;
		OriginalShield = playerEquipment[playerShield];
		OriginalWeapon = playerEquipment[playerWeapon];
		//playerEquipment[playerShield] = -1;
		//playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = -1;
		setAnimation(0x33D);
		healing[0] = 2;
	}
	if (actionTimer == 0 && healing[0] == 2) {
		deleteItem(healing[4], GetItemSlot(healing[4]), 1);
		int Heal = healing[1];
		int HealDiff = (healing[2] - healing[1]);
		if (HealDiff > 0) {
			Heal += misc.random(HealDiff);
		}
		if (healing[3] != -1) {
			addItem(healing[3], 1);
		}
		NewHP =( playerLevel[playerHitpoints] + Heal);
		if (NewHP > getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerHitpoints])) {
			NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
		}
		sendMessage("You eat the "+GetItemName(healing[4])+".");
		playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = OriginalWeapon;
		playerEquipment[playerShield] = OriginalShield;
		resetAnimation();
		resetHE();
	}
	return true;
}[/code][br][size=1]Posted on: June 27, 2007, 02:16:03 PM[/size][hr]the healtimer thing aint here.

Read full topic

item.title: Food help (timer)
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

See this?

		if (actionTimer == 0 && healing[0] == 2) {

Change the two to a 0.

Also,

			actionTimer = 2;

Change the two to a 0.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @The_Moose The Moose
item.description:
@The_Moose wrote:

i have this

[code]/HEALING/

public int healTimer = 0;

public boolean healing() {
	if (actionTimer == 0 && healing[0] == 1) {
		actionAmount++;
		actionTimer = 2;
		OriginalShield = playerEquipment[playerShield];

		//playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = -1;

		healing[0] = 2;
	}
	if (actionTimer == 0 && healing[0] == 2) {
		deleteItem(healing[4], GetItemSlot(healing[4]), 1);

		int HealDiff = (healing[2] - healing[1]);
		if (HealDiff > 0) {
			Heal += misc.random(HealDiff);

		if (healing[3] != -1) {

		}
		NewHP =( playerLevel[playerHitpoints] + Heal);
		if (NewHP > getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerHitpoints])) {
			NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
		}
		sendMessage("You eat the "+GetItemName(healing[4])+".");

item.title: Food help (timer)
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

[quote=“ownage plz, post:10, topic:117382”]try searching for /*HEALING*/

it will look something like

[code]/HEALING/

public int healTimer = 0;

public boolean healing() {
	if (healTimer == 0 && healing[0] == 1 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] >= 0) {
		healTimer = ##;
		OriginalShield = playerEquipment[playerShield];
		OriginalWeapon = playerEquipment[playerWeapon];
		playerEquipment[playerShield] = -1;
		playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = -1;
		//setAnimation(0x33D);
                    setAnimation(829);
		healing[0] = 2;
                    healTimer = 0;
	}
	if (healTimer == 0 && healing[0] == 2) {
		deleteItem(healing[4], GetItemSlot(healing[4]), 1);
		int Heal = healing[1];
		int HealDiff = (healing[2] - healing[1]);
		if (HealDiff > 0) {
			Heal += misc.random(HealDiff);
		}
		if (healing[3] != -1) {
			addItem(healing[3], 1);
		}
		NewHP = (playerLevel[playerHitpoints] + Heal);
		if (NewHP > getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerHitpoints])) {
			NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
		}
		sendMessage("You eat the "+GetItemName(healing[4])+".");
		playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = OriginalWeapon;
		playerEquipment[playerShield] = OriginalShield;
		OriginalWeapon = -1;
		OriginalShield = -1;
                    healTimer = ##;
		resetAnimation();
                    updateRequired = true;
		resetHE();
	}
	return true;
}[/code]

change healTimer = ##; and make it lower if you have that method[/quote]

And if you do not have this, add it. Make sure not to add it inside another code.

Read full topic

item.title: Food help (timer)
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

try searching for /*HEALING*/

it will look something like

[code]/HEALING/

public int healTimer = 0;

public boolean healing() {
	if (healTimer == 0 && healing[0] == 1 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] >= 0) {
		healTimer = ##;
		OriginalShield = playerEquipment[playerShield];
		OriginalWeapon = playerEquipment[playerWeapon];
		playerEquipment[playerShield] = -1;
		playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = -1;
		//setAnimation(0x33D);
                    setAnimation(829);
		healing[0] = 2;
                    healTimer = 0;
	}
	if (healTimer == 0 && healing[0] == 2) {
		deleteItem(healing[4], GetItemSlot(healing[4]), 1);
		int Heal = healing[1];
		int HealDiff = (healing[2] - healing[1]);
		if (HealDiff > 0) {
			Heal += misc.random(HealDiff);
		}
		if (healing[3] != -1) {
			addItem(healing[3], 1);
		}
		NewHP = (playerLevel[playerHitpoints] + Heal);
		if (NewHP > getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerHitpoints])) {
			NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
		}
		sendMessage("You eat the "+GetItemName(healing[4])+".");
		playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = OriginalWeapon;
		playerEquipment[playerShield] = OriginalShield;
		OriginalWeapon = -1;
		OriginalShield = -1;
                    healTimer = ##;
		resetAnimation();
                    updateRequired = true;
		resetHE();
	}
	return true;
}[/code]

change healTimer = ##; and make it lower if you have that method

Read full topic
